START.name: Forest
START.desc: You wake up in a dense forest. You have no memory of how you got here, but you know that you must figure out what happened. You are surrounded by trees on all sides

CAVM.name: Cave mouth
CAVM.desc: After walking for what you think was around half an hour, you arive at a large mouth of a cave. South would lead you into the cave which you can see some sort of light in, and north would lead you back to where you started. Steep cliff faces flank your east and west

CAVE.name: Cave Entrance
CAVE.desc: You decide to walk into the entrance of the cave and look around. It seems like a rather natural cave, nothing to be seen. Suddenly, the cave entrance behind you collapses, leaving you trapped. You can only move south, towards the camp fire.

CAVM2.name: collapsed entrance
CAVM2.desc: You can not go any further this way, the mouth of the cave has collapsed. You must go South

FIRE.name: campfire in the cave
FIRE.desc: Only being able continue deeper into the cave, you arrive at the campfire, where an old man is sitting. He grins and casts a spell on you, causing you to succumb to unconsciousness. Move North to continue

UNCOSFT.name: Fighting unconsciousness
UNCOSFT.desc: You do your best to try and fight the old man's spell, but his magic is too strong. You can't resist the feeling of unconsciousness any longer.

UNCOS1.name: unconsciousness
UNCOS1.desc: You are swimming around in the black void of unconsciousness. It feels as if you are in a dream. After a while, you notice a faint light to the north of you, lightly pulling you towards it.

SKY.name: carriage
SKY.desc: You swam towards the light, but as you got closer, it got colder. eventually you slowly woke up and let out a groan. You then Hear a man talk to you. 'Hey, you!. Youre finally awake. You were trying to cross the border, right? Walked right into that Imperial ambush, same as us, and that thief over there'

FIELD1.name: Field
FIELD1.desc: After what felt like an hour of walking, you exit the forest and find yourself in an empty field. To the West you spot a house off in the distance. To the north is more empty field. To the east you see a mountain. South leads back into the forest.

SHOUSE.name: East wall of the house
SHOUSE.desc: After walking towards the house for a while, you finally arrive at it. It is a standard looking farm house, and you are looking at its front door.

WHOUSE.name: East wall of the house
WHOUSE.desc: After walking towards the house for a while, you finally arrive at it. It is a standard looking farm house, and you are looking at its front door.
